Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Her crimson optics watched Hydras as her called Rodimus & began to speak with 
the opponent. 

Watching Rodimus, a dull anger & ache was barely felt. Mostly from ages 
ago... from when he first took over as Leader. From the time when Galvatron first 
governed the Decepticon ranks... in her mind.. it was Rodimus who destroyed 
Unicron, & sent him into madness. Unicron was gone, for that she was thankful... 
but Rodimus was a part of Galvatron's madness... & with that madness, the part 
that was Megatron was virtually lost. 

Crimson optics glared at Rodimus. Until she felt Hydra's hand gently take her 
chin, she then looked up at Hydras with a weak but warm smile. Rodimus would 
pay dearly. All of them would. They would seriously pay for the demise of 
those she cared about. 

--part1_127.2be5de86.2c216211_boundary
